intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to adjust the brightness of the lights in the dining room because they find it too bright.  
Constraints & cues: The user has multiple meross light strips available, with at least one currently set to 70% brightness, and others at 48% and 35%. The user did not specify which light strip to adjust, indicating a need for clarification on which specific device to control.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific light strip in the dining room the user wants to adjust, which could lead to incorrect adjustments if not clarified.
